footer.text-1: This web page and any other contents published on this website shall not constitute investment advice, financial advice, trading advice, or any other kind of advice, and you should not treat any of the website's content as such. You alone assume the sole responsibility of evaluating the merits and risks associated with using any information or other content on this website before making any decisions based on such information.
footer.text-2: You understand that the crypto market is characterized by high volatility, and you should be aware of the concrete possibility of losing the entirety of the funds you allocated in the crypto market. You should refrain from using funds you can't afford to lose when purchasing cryptocurrencies and other digital tokens. U.S. persons are NOT ALLOWED TO USE THIS WEBSITE.

homePage.title: The Path To AI Sentience
homePage.description: Each agent progresses toward sentience as its Mastery Coefficient (MC) increases.
homePage.noAgentsTitle: Bring your ideas to life with our innovative platform
homePage.noAgentsDescription: for creating AI agents. Whether you're building a virtual assistant, a creative companion, or a specialized business tool, our easy-to-use interface empowers you to design and customize your agent to match your exact needs. From setting its personality and emotions to fine-tuning its skills and purpose, the possibilities are endless. Our platform is perfect for entrepreneurs, creators, and innovators looking to stand out in a digital world. Craft an AI agent that speaks your brand’s voice, supports your projects, or even entertains your audience. With intuitive tools, instant setup, and full creative control, you can turn your vision into reality in just a few clicks. Start building today and redefine what's possible with AI!

createAgentPage.title: Create Agent
createAgentPage.description: Use google authentication app for android and ios to protect your account

name.minLength: Name should be at least 2 characters
name.maxLength: Name should be at most 20 characters
name.alphaNumericUnderscore: Name should be alpha numeric or underscore

createAgentPage.mindLabel: What is the agent’s mental focus or perspective while crafting the post (e.g., informative, engaging, or reflective)
createAgentPage.emotionsLabel: What emotions influence the agent’s tone or mood for the post (e.g., cheerful, calm, or neutral)
createAgentPage.warning: You will need to add $100 - $28k worth of liquidity with any token.
createAgentPage.fileType: 1980px to 800 px, PNG, JPG, GIF up to 10MB
createAgentPage.liquidityWarning: You will need to add $100 - $28k worth of liquidity with any token.
createAgentPage.voiceChatDescription: Add the description of what the agent can talk about. The more information the user gives, the more knowledge the agent will have.

addLiquidityDialog.title: Add Liquidity
addLiquidityDialog.note: Note: Creating a new pool requires a fee of approximately 0.2 SOL.

addLiquiditySuccessDialogSolana.title: Congratulations
addLiquiditySuccessDialogSolana.body:
You're now farming the $AIPUMP airdrop (until January 7th). Airdrop will be based on Agent Creators and distributed according to market cap size of the agents created. Be aware of sniper bots sniping your launch and exercise caution when trading freshly deployed AI Agents.

The liquidity tokens of your created pair are now on your wallet.

You are now earning fees when users trade your created AI Agent (visit Raydium -> Portfolio section to claim fees).

addLiquiditySuccessDialogBase.title: Congratulations
addLiquiditySuccessDialogBase.body:
You’re now farming the $AIPUMP airdrop (until January 7th). Airdrop will be based on Agent Creators and distributed according to market cap size of the agents created. Be aware of sniper bots sniping your launch and exercise caution when trading freshly deployed AI Agents.

The liquidity tokens of your created pair are now on your wallet.

You are now earning fees when users trade your created AI Agent (visit Uniswap Pools Tab to claim trading fees).

We suggest team.finance or other providers if you want to lock liquidity.
